amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to eliminate funding for Clean Energy Demonstrations.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to eliminate funding for Clean Energy Demonstrations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 135 - 284 (Roll no. 534).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 135 - 284 (Roll no. 534).
